oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Don Rigsby and the Fly by Knights band and Jim Hurst and Friends - 2017-11-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance including sound check by Don Rigsby and the Fly By Knights and the Jim Hurst and Friends band as part of the Bluegrass and Beyond series from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 11, 2017. Includes set up, and sound check for both acts and abbreviated performance from the Jim Hurst and Friends band. Part 2 of 3.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Don Rigsby; Chris Davis; Tim Corbett; Justin Moses; Jim Hurst; Dirk Johnson, Ric McClure and Rick Mauldin; Ben Hall;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Sound check / (03:34) Performance run through of the song Hillbilly Heartaches / (07:46) Walk-in music / (09:46) Opening comments and introductions by Jim Hurst begins abruptly / (10:37) Performs Hillbilly Heartache / (13:18) Performs I Can't Go On Loving You / (15:28) Performance Unidentified Instrumental / Comments from Don and introduction of the band members Chris Davis, Tim Corbett and Justin Moses / (20:30) Performs Footprints In The Snow / (23:39) Performs I'm Gonna Settle Down (Chris Davis-vocal) / (26:44) Introduces the next song / (27:27) Performs I Hear A Sweet Voice Callin' / (31:21) Jim Hurst comments / (31:54) Don talks about growing up listening to music and his musical background / (35:26) Introduces the next song / (36:22) Performs The Mountain Doctor / (39:19) Introduces the next song / (39:38) Performs Little Maggie / (42:11) Introduces the next song / (42:42) Sings Amazing Grace / (45:29) Introduces the next song /

(46:22) Performs Christmas Time's A-Coming / (49:28) Introduces the next song / (50:50) Performs Empty Old Mailbox / (54:17) Introduces next song / (54:41) Performs Medicine Springs / (57:41) Introduces the next song / (59:00) Performs Can't You Hear Me Callin' / (01:02:14) Introduces the next song and gives thanks to Jim Hurst / (01:04:18) Kentucky Waltz / (01:07:55) Final comments by Don and Jim Hurst / (01:08:32) Walk-out music / (01:20:40) Set up and sound check for next performance / (01:27:51) Performance run through of Unidentified Instrumental / (01:30:11) Sound check continues / (01:38:02) Opening comments from Ben Hall and introduction of the band members Dirk Johnson, Ric McClure and Rick Mauldin / (01:40:58) Performs Reed Between The Lines / (01:42:$2) Talks about the previous song and introduces the next song / (01:43:42) Performs Unidentified Instrumental / (01:46:15) Introduces the next song / 01:46:55) Performs Quidology /
